title: Can you please update "Suggested Players"
body:
I really can't be bothered explaining such a basic topic.
Everyone who plays with friends understands the issue.

You release a "Suggested Players to Invite" feature, but it legitimately seems to just list random players.

I have consistently only played with 2 people if I am not playing by myself. I don't think I have EVER invited anyone other than these two.

Why are they not "Suggested"?

Why is a friend of a friend of a friend who's cousin played an ARAM with you once.

Stupid system by Stupid devs.
